query:
SELECT 
  'users' as table_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM users
UNION ALL SELECT 'live_streams', COUNT(*) FROM live_streams
UNION ALL SELECT 'tickets', COUNT(*) FROM tickets
UNION ALL SELECT 'trade_records', COUNT(*) FROM trade_records
UNION ALL SELECT 'points_records', COUNT(*) FROM points_records
UNION ALL SELECT 'settlements', COUNT(*) FROM settlements
UNION ALL SELECT 'points_genesis', SUM(amount) FROM points_records WHERE type = 'genesis' AND status = 'approved'
UNION ALL SELECT 'points_eco', SUM(amount) FROM points_records WHERE type = 'eco' AND status = 'approved'
UNION ALL SELECT 'points_trade', SUM(amount) FROM points_records WHERE type = 'trade' AND status = 'approved';
command:

  'users' as table_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM users
UNION ALL SELECT 'live_streams', COUNT(*) FROM live_streams
UNION ALL SELECT 'tickets', COUNT(*) FROM tickets
UNION ALL SELECT 'trade_records', COUNT(*) FROM trade_records
UNION ALL SELECT 'points_records', COUNT(*) FROM points_records
UNION ALL SELECT 'settlements', COUNT(*) FROM settlements
UNION ALL SELECT 'points_genesis', SUM(amount) FROM points_records WHERE type = 'genesis' AND status = 'approved'
UNION ALL SELECT 'points_eco', SUM(amount) FROM points_records WHERE type = 'eco' AND status = 'approved'
UNION ALL SELECT 'points_trade', SUM(amount) FROM points_records WHERE type = 'trade' AND status = 'approved';
